column1: Uchi////Uchi is the real deal.  I highly recommend forgetting about the fixed menus
column2: and just ordering a wide range of cooked dishes followed by the exceptionally good sushi.  I frankly didn't even find it that expensive for the quality.  I drank much
column5: and still escaped for less than $200 for two.  At this level of execution
column6: with these kinds of ingredients (I have already dreamt about the madai)  that's a bargain.
